articles.title: RBI imposes monetary penalty on three cooperative banks - Moneycontrol
articles.description: While imposing a penalty of Rs 3 lakh on Devika Bank, the RBI said inspection of the bank revealed that it had renewed cash credit facility granted to a sole proprietorship concern whose proprietor was the wife of the director’s brother
articles.content:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) on August 21 said it has imposed monetary penalty on three cooperative banks for certain rule violations.
These banks are Pune-based Walchand Nagar Sahakari Bank, Dah… [+2124 chars]
